DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Standard Dose Reduced Dose Tacrolimus + Sirolimus + Corticosteroids Renal Allograft Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate renal graft function base calculated creatinine clearance 6 month transplantation patient receive regimen 'reduced ' 'standard ' dose tacrolimus plus sirolimus corticosteroid . Blood serum creatinine , incidence biopsy-confirmed acute graft rejection , patient graft survival also evaluate 6 month post transplantation .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion At least 18 year age Endstage renal disease patient receive primary secondary renal allograft cadaveric donor Patients secondary kidney transplant must maintain primary graft least 6 month Exclusion criterion Planned antibody induction Multiple organ transplant Patients high risk acute rejection
